sentences.en: A rapid manoeuvre by the driver prevented an accident.
sentences.cn: 司机动作迅速而熟练因此避免了一场事故.

sentences.en: But Mr Streiff's room for manoeuvre is constrained by politics.
sentences.cn: 然而,斯特雷夫的所能采取的策略受政治因素所限.

sentences.en: HP's defensive legal manoeuvre shows that it recognises the threat.
sentences.cn: 惠普自卫性质的法律行动表明,它认识到了这种威胁.

sentences.en: I manoeuvred my way among the tables to the back corner of the place.
sentences.cn: 我在那些桌子间穿行，来到那地方后面的角落。

sentences.en: Inverted flight is an acrobatic manoeuvre of the plane.
sentences.cn: 倒飞是飞机的一种特技动作.

sentences.en: Q: Tell us about that overtaking manoeuvre with Jenson.
sentences.cn: 问: 跟我们讲讲有关简森的超车策略.

sentences.en: She managed to manoeuvre expertly into the parking space.
sentences.cn: 她熟练地将车子驶进了车位。

sentences.en: Some analysts believe he has made a canny political manoeuvre.
sentences.cn: 一些分析家认为，他的这一政治举措很高明。

sentences.en: That will allow them to manoeuvre the satellite into the shuttle's cargo bay.
sentences.cn: 那将使得他们能把人造卫星移入飞船的货物舱。

sentences.en: The authorities have to manoeuvre the markets into demanding a cut in interest rates.
sentences.cn: 当局不得不干预市场，迫其提出削减利率的要求。

sentences.en: The chopper shot upward in a manoeuvre matched by the other pilot.
sentences.cn: 这架直升飞机向上冲去，另一架飞机也以相同的移动方向冲了上去。

sentences.en: They laid out the enemy by skilful manoeuvre.
sentences.cn: 他们施巧夺天工计拖垮了敌人.

sentences.en: They tired out the enemy by skilful manoeuvre.
sentences.cn: 他们施巧计拖垮了敌人.

sentences.en: They've got the money to manoeuvre with.
sentences.cn: 他们扳得转!

sentences.en: This manoeuvre of his is a diabolical conspiracy.
sentences.cn: 他这一手是个居心叵测的大阴谋.

sentences.en: This manoeuvre rendered the position of the girls exceedingly critical.
sentences.cn: 这样的形势对姑娘们来说顿时危急起来.

sentences.en: We attempted to manoeuvre the canoe closer to him.
sentences.cn: 我们试图让独木舟靠他更近一些。

sentences.en: We manoeuvre through the surface of life, oblivious to the depths below.
sentences.cn: 我们总在生活的表层上居住着, 却忽略了深层的问题.

sentences.en: We manoeuvred the TV in front of the sofa.
sentences.cn: 我们把电视机挪到了沙发前面。

sentences.en: Well, we'll see if Golz can manoeuvre them a little.
sentences.cn: 好吧, 让我们瞧瞧,戈尔兹能不能调动他们一下.

words.tran_cn: 可调动的；操纵灵活的；机动的
机动性；可移动；操纵的灵敏性

trans.tran_cn: 调遣，换防，对抗演习，操纵，技术动作，策略，巧计，花招，伎俩
移动， 转动； 操纵， 控制
trans.tran_en: If you manoeuvre something into or out of an awkward position, you skilfully move it there

trans.tran_cn: 调遣，操纵，控制，诱使，策划
